(2017) |blank_info_sec2 = 0.768 · 4th |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code = |registration_plate = T |website = |footnotes = }} Tungurahua (, literally Province of the Tungurahua; ) is one of the twenty-four provinces of Ecuador. Its capital is Ambato. The province takes its name from the Tungurahua volcano. ==References==
